body: My first NTR. The MC is effing stupid, so is the onee-san. Onee-san's feelings should see justice! I NEED PART 2

All these Ntr stories have the same characteristic for the MC. Self doubt and too much time pondering rather than acting.

@Cathari  Because she chose to be a slut, dumbass.  She could have turned down the friend but instead she easily spread for him after only the slightest bit of convincing. As to your point about "He didn't charm her", bro GTFO with that nonsense. The chick chose to spread, that's all you need. The friend did nothing wrong. The MC did nothing wrong since he was trying to treat her as proper family which is actually quite reasonable. The only one that acted wrong here is the chick. If she had rejected the friend and (GASP) approached MC herself,  there would be no NTR. Don't get me wrong, I fully understand why she did what she did but my point is, you're defending slutty behavior like a retard, just saying

This is what NTR should be. No mind breaks and rape should be involved. The mc isn't really  a wimp and he acted like how a normal human would've. The dude who bangs the girl didn't even have any evil intention for the girl and just loves her genuinely. The girl, well, it is hinted that she had a fucked up past in her family so you can't really blame her for accepting the dude easily. The mc just didn't have a chance to express her feelings properly which I think is pretty common for a lot of people. Overall, everyone in this story had a pretty reasonable reason for their actions and it ain't just some typical NTR cheating, mindbreak, and rape trope.

This is quite llikely the most down to earth NTR  ever made. The dude that nails the chick isn't an ugly bastard, he dont rape her, theres no blackmail, he even asks his friend if its ok to make a move before doing it, he wears a condom during sex and afterward he says he hope to marry her to start a family. The girl didnt become his cumdump, she didn't mind break. Protag's only real mistake was not  expressing his feelings. He didn't jerk off in the closet while he watched her get fucked by another man,  nor did he stand there like a moron. He talked to the guy, raised valid points and that's that.   I think this is exactly why IMO it hits way harder than many other NTR, because its not over-the-top. True that  teh girl had only known the friend for a bit but she had a fucked up sexual past, women with history of abuse tend to have erratic sexual behavior.  Great writing great art, artist really gave a masterclass on drawing fine piece of ass here.

I have doubts due to Closet, which is a shame since mc could; confront and shame her somehow he still has sway over her, tell his parents and alt f4 the whole thing straight outa the sheets to the streets, break out the big guns with the police and rape charges, or any other narrative situation Yamakumo can think of.  That would really make for a great crap show story. It's been awhile since this was drawn, anyone know anything about Yamakumo? twatter pixiv etc? He's got great artwork.
